chunk_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care
final_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care

sentences.text: they can become infected super easily and be bad.
not an "omg you gonna die" but definitely take a trip soon to get any cat bites checked.
if you've been strangled always go to the er after.
just to add to this for awareness - if you were strangled by a romantic partner, you are 750% more likely to be killed by them.
red streaks near a wound, particularly on the limbs, can indicate a spreading infection and may be an early sign of sepsis.
i know two people who had no other symptoms besides the streaks both were admitted for sepsis and in hospital for a while.
sudden onset dementia, especially in old women and diaper wearers, might be the only symptom of a bladder infection.
if it is that, antibiotics will fix it.
